title: From Poland With Love ❤️
contents: Hello Players! Our game is a part of an unique Steam Sale that offers the best gaming experiences filled with action, mystery, and fun brought to you straight from Poland - From Poland With Love ❤️, running August 12-19! This is a wonderful occasion to dive into some incredible indie games and discover the creativity that Polish people bring to the gaming world! Cheers!

title: The best Steam games that have literally zero players
contents: It's the year 2123. Half-Life 3 still isn't out yet. In a dark, dusty server farm, two explorers finally break through the wall to the inner chamber. Flashlights dance across strange hieroglyphics, ancient messages etched into the whiteboard - "Dead Space Remake is fire," "I totally ship Astarion and Gale," "lol how mid is Starfield?" Buried amid these decrepit slabs of black plastic and SSD trays, forgotten, forsaken videogames of a bygone empire. Once, they were adored by millions of people. Now, they are abandoned, left to rot in the Steam libraries of gamers past. It might be hard to imagine, a world where Baldur's Gate 3 and Counter-Strike 2 have become but relics. Time, however, is a brutal monarch. Even the best games are eventually left with zero players. Read the rest of the story... RELATED LINKS: Twitch Prime's next five free games are available now Dear Esther devs The Chinese Room aren't happy about the current digital refund system Dear Esther: Landmark Edition is out tomorrow on PC, and it's free for owners of the original

title: Kholat for Nintendo Switch is out now!
contents: Kholat for Nintendo Switch is out now and to celebrate it we're making 33% discount for PC version! Kholat Nintendo Switch port was a complete in-house process for our studio, which took us about 10 months, with a team of 3 individuals - a programmer, technical artist and a tester. So if you're Nintendo Switch player you can grab our awesome game on Nintendo Store!

title: Seven: Enhanced Edition with 75% discount coupon for all Kholat users!
contents: Hey all Kholat users out there! We have great gift for you. If you own our game on Steam, at this moment you should check your inventory. Right now you should find there special coupon with 75% discount to buy Seven: Enhanced Edition! Seven: Enhanced Edition is an open-world, isometric stealth and action role-playing game, in which you play as Teriel, a master thief sent on a mission that will shake the foundations of the Vetrall Empire. Free roam across the vibrant prison island of Peh and explore the sea depths on board of a submarine in the Drowned Past expansion. It's second game from IMGN.PRO dev studio and first co-developed with Fool's Theory. We poured a lot of effort into that game and it would be great if you would check it out! https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/clans/8825612/c860da84666dc11ffec0cdfce242cc5a3b749c9c.jpg Features: SEVEN HOURS OF NEW GAMEPLAY IN DROWNED PAST EXPANSION 30+ hours of base game and 7+ in Drowned Past Expansion! Continue exploration as serial thief Teriel, who runs into ‘the Enclave’, a ragtag group of mysterious vagabonds . EXPLORE A VIBRANT OPEN WORLD FROM AN ISOMETRIC PERSPECTIVE From the moment you set foot on Peh, the island is open to you. Sneak, run, climb, and fight your way across a colourful array of environments. CHOOSE YOUR PLAYSTYLE As a master thief, Teriel is well versed in the art of stealth. Get the jump on enemies from behind and above, but there’s nothing to stop you from letting loose with an array of devastating weapons, and unleashing deadly magical skills. ENCOUNTER A MYRIAD OF COLOURFUL CHARACTERS Encounter an array of people, from despondent slaves and prisoners through to rich socialites UNCOVER AN EPIC STORY OF DECEIT AND TREACHERY On Peh, everyone has an agenda, and often there’s more than meets the eye. Dive into a world teeming with distrust, and crushed between the machinations of mighty powers. Have a great adventure! IMGN.PRO Team

title: Kholat has more than 3,5 million users but only one unit sold in Nepal
contents: https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/clans/8825612/fb7cb580533d8a7cf9468674914f323944e52060.jpg Recently we did a summary of Kholat life cycle since its launch in 2015, and we’re excited to announce that more than 3,5 million people now own the game on PC and consoles all together. These numbers feel even more amazing because of the fact that it was our debut title, that helped us to establish IMGN.PRO reputation as development studio. While we were digging the numbers one peculiar fact draw our attention – there was a country where Kholat sold one single unit on Steam – Nepal. We couldn’t help ourselves but wonder who is that person. Whoever is that guy or gal, that one person in 29 million people country, we would like to express our gratitude for the support and grant him or her a lifetime voucher for all past and future games developed and published by IMGN.PRO on Steam. If that’s you and you’re reading it now - please reach out to us on cooperation@imgn.pro We would actually love to visit Nepal and meet you in person soon. To all our community out there – we would really appreciate sharing this info. Cheers! IMGN.PRO Team

title: Kholat has received official Chinese localization
contents: Dear Chinese Players! We’re excited to finally announce that Kholat has received official Chinese localization! It was one of the most requested features of our game and at the same time we saw that many Chinese players play and enjoy Kholat, despite lack of support for their language. Starting from now you can experience our interpretation of the terrifiying Dyatlov Pass Incident in your native language. Stay tuned for more news and Happy New Year! EDIT 4 Feburary 2019 - we have fixed the problem with Japanese translations accidentally present during some cutscenes. Regards IMGN.PRO Team

title: The story continues in Kholat: Aftermath Part 1 comic book
contents: Hey, Kholat: Aftermath Part 1 is a compilation of four seemingly unrelated stories: a mysterious interrogation referring to one of the hidden notes in the game, Grazeniuk’s letter to his fiancée, a call for help from the Section 22 prisoner and the investigation beginning overseen by two Moscow militiamen. What will happen next to Kholat’s personalities? Is all what happened nothing but the product of Grazeniuk’s sick imagination? Or maybe somebody’s trying to hide the fact that unexplained experiments taking place in Section 22 got out of control? Will Anton’s identity be finally revealed? Answers to all those questions await in Kholat: Aftermath Part 1! Available now as DLC on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/768730/Kholat_Aftermath_Part_1__Comic_Book/ Cheers IMGN.PRO team

title: New comic book coming soon!
contents: Dear players, It's been over 2 years already since Kholat was released. So far we have received countless questions from our community about a possible continuation of the story known from our game. Luckily, today we can announce that the new member of our family will be born in a little while. This time it won't be a video game though... Kholat: Aftermath Part 1 is a comic book made by Marcin Jedrzejek (drawings) and Lukasz Kubiak (story) and it will be a direct sequel to the already known adventure. Soon we will share more about it. Stay tuned! Take care! IMGN.PRO Team http://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/clans/8825612/cdc3152a1bdd66175153925ac7a18d803c218f01.jpg

title: Kholat on Xbox One is out now!
contents: Hello gamers around the world, The wait is finally over and we can proudly announce that Kholat found its way to Microsoft's newest console. To mark our fantastic cooperation with BlitWorks, which held the responsibility of porting the game, we prepared a new trailer, especially for Xbox One version. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BsPA2HzMQ8s If you would like to play our game on Xbox One, simply follow this linkand it will take you directly to your local store. Have a great time discovering the secrets of the story based on real-life events that took place on the Diatlov Pass over 58 years ago. Don't forget to share your feedback with us. We can't wait to read your opinions :) Best wishes! IMGN.PRO Team

title: Kholat is coming to Xbox One!
contents: Hello lovers of the spooky genres, It took some time, but it’s almost here! Kholat on Xbox One is finally happening, and IMGN.PRO is excited to share the news with all the gamers that have been patiently waiting for the game to be available on their favourite console. On June 9th this year, fans of horror and unsolved mysteries will be able to purchase Kholat from the Xbox Store for 19,99 USD, but that’s not the end of the good news! A week before launch on June 2nd, pre-orders for the game will start. Łukasz Kubiak, the co-author of the game’s narrative, says: “We never thought that Kholat would become so popular. Thanks to the amazing feedback we have received from players around the world, today we are proud to announce the game’s upcoming launch on Xbox One. At the same time, we’re aware that our fans have many questions and that there are many theories and assumptions concerning the events we have presented in our story. All I can say right now is that looking at how big our community has become, answers to those questions may emerge in the future.” https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CDT8RcTBPlU PS This port was made thanks to our friends from BlitWorks. They've done a fantastic job and together with us, just can't wait for your feedback about the Xbox One version. Best wishes! IMGN.PRO Team

title: Get composers autograph on vinyl – preorder it now!
contents: http://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steamcommunity/public/images/clans/8825612/5a55a98e471cb8cc283a78dbdd05881140937537.jpg Dear Kholat players, Previously, we announced that Kholat is going to get its soundtrack released on vinyl. Now we're happy to share more details about this limited album and it's hard to not get excited about it, because of one thing: "The first 25 customers who place the order will also receive the composer’s autograph on the record sleeve!" Who wouldn't want to get their cover signed by Arkadiusz Reikowski? If you're interested in this fantastic project, then please follow this link. Best wishes! IMGN.PRO Team

title: NEW LANGUAGES in Patch 1.03!
contents: We’ve been collecting feedback regarding our game for nearly two months since the release. After a short time it was clear to us that Kholat was especially warmly received in Italy and Turkey. We had many requests from the community asking for the localization of the title into those languages, so we have engaged our resources and we’re able to reveal the effects today! Localization was carried out with the help of Crewals ( http://www.crewals.com/tr/ ) and FenixTM ( http://fenixtm.net/index.php ) - a big thank you to both teams. Godere / zevk almak! IMGN.PRO

title: Kholat Patch 1.01
contents: We’re pleased to announce that today Kholat patch 1.01 is live and available for download now! The update includes: -launch crashes fixes -stability fixes -game will not save in Act 3, players with save from Act 3 can continue playing from last save location from Act 2 -key bindings fixed -invert mouse fixed -gameplay bugs fixes -inventory (map, compass, journal) will now properly scale based on user configured camera FOV -added few missing localization texts Patch will be available as an update for Steam platform users.

title: Kholat „The Best Screenshot” Competition!
contents: Hello everyone! As we mentioned last week, we have a surprise for you – it is the best screenshot competition! The rules: 1.You need to submit new screenshot from Kholat (competition starts 17th of June 2015 11:00 am CET) on our community hub on Steam. 2. Submit it with a title „THE BEST SCREENSHOT COMPETITION” and remember only one screenshot per person will participate in the contest. So take your time to make a really wonderful pic! 3. We will check all the screenshots named „THE BEST SCREENSHOT COMPETITION” and only the new submissions will be a part of the contest so please do not change the names of the screenshots already submitted on our forum before the start of the competition and absolutely do not use the screenshots that are not made by you. 4. Screenshots with the biggest number of „thumbs up” will win the prizes. If there will be a tie between the screenshots we will choose the winners. 5. Competition will take one week starting today 11:00 am CET, ending 24th of June 2015 11:00 am CET. Prizes: 1. Box version of Kholat (including game, CD with original soundtrack, map/poster, a pin), t-shirt, comic book „Prologue”, and more pins. 2. Comic book „Prologue”, t-shirt, pins and digital version of the OST. 3. T-shirt, comic book „Prologue”, pins. 4. T-shirt, pins. 5. T-shirt. 6. Comic book „Prologue”, digital version of the OST. 7. Digital version of the OST. 8. Digital version of the OST. 9. Digital version of the OST. 10. Digital version of the OST.

title: Thank you!
contents: We are couple of days after our release. We would like to say a big THANK YOU, for all who bought our game. You are awesome! As we already mentioned - this is our debut, and we believe that it was really great first step into games development. In the near future we will deliver you a patch with some improvements, optimization and tweaks, next step it's a MAC version of Kholat, which is basically ready but we are optimizing it now, after that if game will perform well on Steam, you can expect some new content as our goal is to keep developing of Kholat and the story in the future. Next week you can expect a surprise ;)

title: Kholat - win a special box edition!
contents: Kholat – a most terryfying journey of your life starts today! And we have a very special event for you! Only today for next 10 hours, you can win something really special! Amazing edition of our game, in special, handcrafted metal box. It is an absolutely limited gem for any collector. There is only couple of metal boxes created for us and they will never be available in regular sales. This rarity could be yours! This special set contains: 1. Absolutelty unique, handcrafted metal box, created by our friend Grzegorz Beczała at SCRAP ART (https://www.facebook.com/gbsart) 2. DVD Box 3. Game disc 4. CD with soundtrack created by Arkadiusz Reikowski 5. Pin 6. Map/poster 7. T-shirt 8. Burglar cap 9. 9 Steam codes included in the box for your friends (one of it you will get at midnight release today) 10. Comic book with a prologue What will you need to do? 1. Go to our facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/Kholat 2. Like this post 3. Share it on your facebook wall to spread a word about our game and release date. 3. We will pick winner randomly using fanpagekarma.com Thank you!

title: KHOLAT - Official Release Trailer
contents: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uM0tk9Qsw54 So here it is! Our official release trailer for Kholat! It is the best short summary of one and half years of our development work, which is finally coming to an end. During that time Kholat has undergone the way from an ambitious idea in our heads to a finished game. Narrated by one of the most famous British actors - Sean Bean. One thing however hasn’t changed from the beginning – Kholat is a game that doesn’t follow mainstream game design rules but creates its own, which are based on players intelligence and imagination. Please watch it, and if you enjoy - share it with your friends. Thanks!
